text: Kristina Bernadette Cojuangco Aquino (born February 14, 1971) is a Filipino actress and television host. She is the fourth daughter of Former President Corazon Aquino and Former senator Ninoy Aquino and sister of president Benigno Aquino III. Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Filipino actors Category:Corazon Aquino Category:First Ladies and First Gentlemen of the Philippines Category:People from Quezon City
title: Kris Aquino
